string-array.name: bbc_appetizer_descriptions
string-array.item: We\'re still not sure why bacon isn\'t in the candy aisle.
Perfecting movie night one sugary, bacon-y, beer-infused kernel at a time.
Carbs, sugar and vegetables are all part of a balanced diet, and we\'ve got you covered.
Our advice: Save your spoon, and just use sticks of bacon to eat this dip.
